description: This notification is sent when the overall enforcement mode in
the agent changes.

event.Summary: Overall enforcement mode in agent changed to $v2

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Enforce Mode. This denotes the enforcement mode for
the entitlement tag.
* In Entitlement notifications this will indicate the
enforcement mode of an individual entitlement.
* In global notifications this indicates the overall
enforcement mode in the agent.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementEnforceMode

description: This notification is sent when the Smart agent is initialized
and ready.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing has been
enabled.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing has been
disabled
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing registration
with Cisco Software Manager has failed.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.

event.Summary: Smart licensing registration with CSM failed

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing registration
with Cisco Software Manager has succeeded.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.

event.Summary: Smart licensing registration with CSM succeeded

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing ID (node)
certificate has expired.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing ID (node)
certificate renewal has succeded.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.

event.Summary: Smart licensing ID (node) certificate renewal successful

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing ID (node)
certificate renewal has failed.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.

event.Summary: Smart licensing ID (node) certificate renewal failed

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing entitlement
(AUTH) renew was successful.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart licensing entitlement
(AUTH) renew has failed.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart Agent
failed to communicate with CSSM.

event.Summary: Smart agent failed to communicate with CSSM

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart Agent
communication with CSSM has been restored

event.Summary: Smart agent communication with CSSM restored

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart Agent
Id (Node) certificate renewal is not started.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.

event.Summary: Smart agent ID (Node) certificate renewal not started

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when the enforcement mode of an
entitlement has changed.

event.Summary: Enforcement mode of entitlement $v2 changed to $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSmartAgentNotifyEntitlementEnforceMode CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementRequestCount u 9999 CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementTag s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementVersion s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementEnforceMode i 1 CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo s EXAMPLE

description: Number of count that was requested for this entitlement tag. If
the value is less than zero it means that this entitlement is
not in use.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementRequestCount

description: The tag name for the entitlement in use.
This is abbreviated form of the entitlement tag.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementTag

description: Entitlement version.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementVersion

description: Enforce Mode. This denotes the enforcement mode for
the entitlement tag.
* In Entitlement notifications this will indicate the
enforcement mode of an individual entitlement.
* In global notifications this indicates the overall
enforcement mode in the agent.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementEnforceMode

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when the ID certificate is
out of the valid range after the system clock changed.
It means the current time is either before the start time or
after the end time of the certificate.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.

event.Summary: Smart agent ID certificate is out of range

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when the system clock has changed.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to warn regarding the impending
evaluation time expiry.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to notify the expiration of the
evaluation period.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to warn regarding the impending
expiry of the id (node) certificate.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.

event.Summary: Smart agent ID (node) certificate expiration warning detected

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to inform that the product has
successfully un-registered with the Cisco Smart Software
Manager.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to inform that Cisco Smart Software
Manager has send error in de-registration response.
The agent will locally remove all registration information and
transition back to the unidentified (not-registered) state.
CSSM would not know the agent is un-registered.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSmartAgentNotifyDeRegisterFailed CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaFailureReason i 0 CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaDeRegisterFailureMsg s EXAMPLE

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Smart Agent Registration/de-registration failure reasons. This
should be received in response message from Cisco Smart
Software
Manager.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaFailureReason

description: The failure message of the last deregistration request.
This OID is not relevant when Smart Agent is operating in Policy
mode.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaDeRegisterFailureMsg

description: This notification is sent to inform the Agent is now in
thirdparty mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to inform the Agent is now out of
thirdparty mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to inform that Utility certificate
has expired.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to inform that Utility certificate
renewal has failed.

event.Summary: Utility certificate renewal failed due to $v2

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Failure reason string.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaThirdPartyAndUtilityFailureMsg

description: This notification is sent to inform that Utility certificate
renewal successful.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to inform that Utility data reporting
has started.
In TPBP this will occur when the product instance receives a
utility certificate during registration.
In SPLA utility it occurs when utility is enabled, the URL is
set in the CLI and the agent has received subscription
information.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to inform that Utility data reporting
has stopped.
In TPBP this will occur on a de-registration or when the utility
certificate expires.
In SPLA it occurs when utility is utility is disabled, a
de-registration occurs or the ID certificate expires.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to inform that rum report send
failed.

event.Summary: RUM report send failed due to $v2

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Failure reason string.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaThirdPartyAndUtilityFailureMsg

description: This notification is sent to inform Utility cert config
mismatch. The Smart licensing url setting does not match the
FQDN embedded in the utility certificate.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Utility is enabled and we have
subscription but smart transport is not configured

event.Summary: Smart transport not configured on device $v1

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Smart Agent receives a
HostnameChange event and new hostname is matched with one or
more fields in current UDI.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when request for the export
authorization key has failed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSmartAgentNotifyExportRequestFailure CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementFeatureName s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementTag s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaExportFailureMessage s EXAMPLE

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: The short feature name used by CSSM. May be NULL.
The feature name is only available after the agent receives a
response, from Cisco, to an Authorization request.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementFeatureName

description: The tag name for the entitlement in use.
This is abbreviated form of the entitlement tag.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementTag

description: Failure message in string format.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaExportFailureMessage

description: This notification is sent when standby or members do not have
the export authorization keys for all the same features as the
active has.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSmartAgentNotifyExportHAMismatch CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaExportFailureReason i 9999 CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaExportFailureMessage s EXAMPLE

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Failure reason enum. Enum includes:
Invalid = 0
AlreadyRegistered = 1
DailyJobTimerReset = 2
Deregister = 3
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaExportFailureReason

description: Failure message in string format.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaExportFailureMessage

description: This notification is sent when the request for export
authorization (or return) key is currently not supported by the
satellite.

event.Summary: Export authorization key request not supported by satellite

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent to specify whether the Customer is
allowed or not allowed to use an export controlled entitlement.

Summary.eval: ($v3==0) ? 'Customer not allowed to use export controlled entitlement $v2' : 'Customer allowed to use export controlled entitlement $v2'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSmartAgentNotifyExportControlledTag CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementTag s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementExportAllowed i 0

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: The tag name for the entitlement in use.
This is abbreviated form of the entitlement tag.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementTag

description: Export allowed flag value for this entitlement
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementExportAllowed

description: This notification is sent to platform so that it reports the
entire list of End Points to Smart Agent instead of delta.

event.Summary: Smart agent end point reset notification occurred

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when the request for the export
authorization key is successful.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSmartAgentNotifyExportRequestSuccess CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementFeatureName s EXAMPLE CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementTag s EXAMPLE

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: The short feature name used by CSSM. May be NULL.
The feature name is only available after the agent receives a
response, from Cisco, to an Authorization request.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementFeatureName

description: The tag name for the entitlement in use.
This is abbreviated form of the entitlement tag.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaEntitlementTag

description: This notification is sent in all the below scenarios:
- A new Smart Licensing authorization code has been
installed.
- A new authorization code has been installed and has
overwritten a previous code.
- The platform has delivered a list of entitlements to the
agent that may be authorized.
This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is operating in
Policy mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when an authorization code has
been removed.
This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is operating in
Policy mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when policy file is installed in
device.
This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is operating in
Policy mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when policy file is removed from
device.
This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is operating in
Policy mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification would be sent when RUM report ack has not
been received in the time (in days) specified by the installed
policy.
This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is operating in
Policy mode.

event.Summary: RUM report acknowledgement not received in $v2 days

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Number of days RUM ack has not been received.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaDaysRUMAckNotReceived

description: This notification is sent when a RUM report ACK is received.
This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is operating in
Policy mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when an attempt to install licensing
authorization code is failed.
This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is operating in
Policy mode.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when a license is in use that was not
purchased so reporting will be required at the time specified.
This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is operating in
Policy mode.

event.Summary: Smart agent reporting required within $v2 days

description: This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Number of days within which reporting has to be done.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaDaysReportingRequired

description: This notification is sent when Policy installation fails.
Policy Mode Notification: This notificaiton/OID is exclussive
for Policy mode of operation.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Failure message in string format.
This OID value is not persisted. SNMP get or SNMP walk would not
fetch a proper value for this OID.
Policy Mode OID: This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is
operating in Policy mode.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaPolicyModeFailureMessage

description: This notification is sent when Policy installation is
Successful.
Policy Mode Notification: This notificaiton/OID is exclussive
for Policy mode of operation.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when backend sserver (in most cases
on-Prem) does not support reporting.
Policy Mode Notification: This notificaiton/OID is exclussive
for Policy mode of operation.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Trust is installed
successfully.
Policy Mode Notification: This notificaiton/OID is exclussive
for Policy mode of operation.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: This notification is sent when Trust installation fails.
Policy Mode Notification: This notificaiton/OID is exclussive
for Policy mode of operation.
This notification is sent during device bootup. It contains
current RUM acknowledgement state, discated by installed
policy.
This field contains the device identifier information
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaSUDIInfo

description: Current RUM report ACK status in device, dictated by installed
policy. Enum Includes:
invalid = 0
ackNotRequired = 1
reportNotRequired = 2
received = 3
notReceived = 4
expired = 5
This OID value is not persisted. SNMP get or SNMP walk would
not
fetch a proper valuefor this OID.
Policy Mode OID: This OID is only relevant when Smart Agent is
operating in Policy mode.
variables.name: CISCO-SMART-LIC-MIB::ciscoSlaPolicyModeInitialACKState
